message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase the product for $9,500. I believe this product would be highly beneficial to you, and this offer reflects its true value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $8,500 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $9,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,250. I'm still interested in the product, but I'd like to get as close to my target price as possible.
